excerpt: The TMCM-1230 is a single axis controller/driver module for 2-phase bipolar stepper motors. The module can either be used with TMCL firmware supporting standalone operation as well as direct mode control using TMCL™ commands or with CANopen firmware supporting control using the CANopen® protocol. Both firmware versions make extensive use of the Trinamic TMC4361 motion controller and TMC5160 motor driver. Dynamic current control, and quiet, smooth and effcient operation are combined with StealthChop™, DcStep™, StallGuard2™ and CoolStep™ features.Special FeaturesDcStep™ChopSync™CoolStep™passive brakingshort detectionSpreadCycle™Stall detectionStallGuard2™StealthChop2™

Documentation: TMCL Firmware Manual for Firmware V1.16
CANopen Firmware Manual for Firmware V3.25
